actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to grant the consent of Congress to Harbour Island, Incorporated, Tampa, Florida, to construct and maintain two fix-span bridges in and over Garrison Channel, Tampa, Florida

summary.text: Grants the consent of Congress to Harbour Island, Incorporated, to construct two fix-span bridges over the Garrison Channel, Tampa, Florida. Requires such bridges to be approved by the Secretary of Transportation. Modifies a specified navigation project concerning Seddon Channel.

titles.title: A bill to grant the consent of Congress to Harbour Island, Incorporated, Tampa, Florida, to construct and maintain two fix-span bridges in and over Garrison Channel, Tampa, Florida
